I play this game and I HATE IT!... But I LOVE IT!... 
It's an eternal cycle. One day, you have the best team ever and you play like a GAWD.
Next day, you play like you have arthritis... 
Spend your wages on fancy cases to get AMAZING blue pixels... Seems legit.
Love this game though...
